text: Dick Becker is an American gasser drag racer.Davis, Larry. Gasser Wars (Cartech, 2003), pp.183-8. Becker drove a Ford-powered 1950 Anglia dubbed The Hammer.Davis, p.187. He won one NHRA national title, in G/Gas, at the 1967 Nationals at Indianapolis Raceway Park. His winning pass was 11.42 seconds at .Davis, p.185. ==Notes== ==Sources== *Davis, Larry. Gasser Wars, North Branch, MN: Cartech, 2003, pp. 183–8. Category:Dragster drivers Category:American racing drivers
title: Dick Becker
